summary: These are two outfit sets I originally made for Oblivion and Fallout 3. The tops are weighted for BBP and the shoes use HDT High Heels system.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Dominatrix and Purelust
Author: Edhildil
08,26,2014
ver1




[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

These are two sets I originally made for Oblivion. The Dominatrix outfit was also made for Fallout 3.
They are modular and most pieces will fit with each other so you can mix and match.
This is not a lore friendly mod. The tops are weighted for BBP and the shoes use HDT High Heels system. 
They are created from a specific custom body shape based from CBBE.
They are skimpy so expect a lot of skin.

Craftable and temperable outfits, female only.

Crafting is in the Leather catagory, to temper you'll need the Arcane Smithing perk.

The world model for the armor pieces looks like a book, and acts like one. That means if you drop one of the items it will look like a book and it will look like a book in your inventory. Why? Because it is funny.

Pieces include:

Top
Panty
Gloves
Sleeves
Boots
Garter

Each set has two options: Latex or Leather. There is also an optional fishnet sleeve, fishnet top, and high heel shoe (not a boot).

mods in screenshots include:

Hair: Apachii SkyHair female pack
Skin: Sporty Sexy Sweat, SG Textures Renewal CBBE
Eyes: The Eyes of Beauty


[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3664/updatesb.png[/img]

10,28,2014:

Added item: Purelust Fishnet and Latex Corset -transparent fishnet top

Added item: Dominatrix Latex Heels -high heel shoes, not boots so the fishnet stockings are fully exposed.

Fixed the magnitude on the high spell effect so they function better- Thank you BlitzBlade77 for spotted this out and your excellent suggestion and testing.




[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


Calientes CBBE body mod installed and running in your game.(textures)

BBP Skeletons and animations ( You CTD without the skeleton!)

HDT High Heels system

 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.



[color=#ff7700][size=4]Uninstallation:[/size][/color]

Delete Data_meshes_armor_edhildil_dominatrix folder
Delete Data_meshes_armor_edhildil_purelust folder
Delete Data_textures_armor_edhildil_dominatrix folder
Delete Data_textures_armor_edhildil_purelust folder
Delete Edhildils Dominatrix and Purelust esp. file



[img]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/9223/bugske.png[/img]


Apparently somehow I misplaced a right forearm bone somewhere, animations for the most part are fine but sometime there is a slight bump in the right arm. It is not that noticeable and I'll fix it soon. If anyone has seen where I left that bone please put in the Nexus lost and found box for me, thank you.

The UV map on the new high heel shoes is for UNP as that is how they were made. If you ignore that for now until I can either alter the foot to CBBE or change the UV to match CBBE it would be helpful and forgiving.

[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Caliente for CBBE
NPR (original corset mesh)
Edhildil
Edhildil and DonMichael71 for the heels

Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
FRAPS
GIMP 2


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
